Title: Butterfly
Writer: James M. Cain (novel), Matt Cimber (adaptation), John F. Goff (screenplay), Matt Cimber (screenplay)
Actors: Stacy Keach, Pia Zadora, Orson Welles, Lois Nettleton
Plot: In 1937 Nevada, silver mine caretaker Jess Tyler is reunited with his teenage daughter Kady who will do anything to persuade Jess to let her have claim to the mine.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 9 nominations.
